projects.name: ChessNav
projects.description: Custom chess evaluation bot using 3 criteria to evaluate a position with 88% accuracy.
highlights: Criteria 1. Material Imbalance -> simple calculation based on the material on the board for each piece
Criteria 2. Activity -> generate a hotmap of the board to see the squares controlled by each side
Criteria 3. King Safety -> use the hotmap to see how safe the king is based on the 8 surrounding squares
Assign a score to each criteria for both colors, finding the difference to evaluate the position
